### This is how one would add a figure (possibly flanking with \vspace{1cm} or \bigskip):

# ```{r FIGLABEL, out.width = "100%", fig.cap="CAPTION", echo=FALSE}
# #plot(1:5)
# ### Or from file:
# include_graphics(path = "./FILENAME.PNG")
# ```
### Use for crossref:
#\ref{fig:plotchunk}

### Or the latex way:
# \begin{figure}
# \centering
# \setlength{\fboxrule}{0cm}\fbox{\includegraphics[width=0.5\columnwidth]{FILENAME}}
# \caption{CAPTION}
# \label{FIGLABEL}
# \end{figure}

### For tables use grid table (or normal latex table -> see Sweave template file):
# : CAPTION.\label{TABLELABEL}
# 
# +---------------+---------------+--------------------+
# | Left          | Center        | Right              |
# +===============+:=============:+===================:+
# | Bananas       | first line\   | first line\        |
# |               | next line     | next line\         |
# +---------------+---------------+--------------------+
# | Bananas       | first line\   | first line\        |
# |               | next line     | next line          |
# +---------------+---------------+--------------------+
